Parameters: Cell or tissue type (human airway epithelial cells, rodent tracheal models); species; donor characteristics; passage number; culture model (MucilAir™, primary cells at ALI); days at ALI; differentiation medium; tissue processing; donor/animal characteristics; model system (in vitro ALI, in vivo); sampling timepoints; 3D culture model type; exposure conditions; culture model

EGF/TGF-α stimulation (concentration, duration); environmental or inflammatory stimuli (heated tobacco aerosol, cigarette smoke, e-cigarette aerosol); inflammatory cytokines (IL-1β, TNF-α, IL-13); oxidative stress; EGFR inhibitors; tissue fixation and processing; staining protocols (Alcian Blue, PAS, Muc5AC immunohistochemistry); antibodies for immunofluorescence; histology protocols; gene expression methods (qRT-PCR, RNA-seq); pathway inhibitors (EGFR, MAPK, NF-κB)

MUC5AC and MUC5B mRNA levels (fold change, log2 fold change); Mucin protein concentration (µg/mL); Goblet cell count and percentage; Alcian Blue/PAS-positive cell counts; Muc5AC/B immunostaining intensity and distribution; Goblet-to-ciliated cell ratio; Goblet cell count per field; EGFR/MAPK/NF-κB activation; Expression levels of mucin gene family (MUC1, MUC4, MUC5AC, MUC5B, MUC16); Differential expression statistics; Pathway enrichment scores; Time-course of goblet cell appearance; Lineage relationship data; Changes over exposure period; Correlation with functional endpoints; Dose-response to EGFR agonists; Cytokine dose-response
